no.ovitas.compass2.kb.store.service.impl
Class TopicExpansionManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
  no.ovitas.compass2.kb.store.service.impl.TopicExpansionManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TopicExpansionManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
TopicExpansionManagerJPA
public class TopicExpansionManagerImpl
extends Object
implements TopicExpansionManager

Generic implementation of the TopicExpansionManager interface that handles the configuration of the manager.

Author:
Csaba Daniel

setScopeFilter

public void setScopeFilter(Collection<Scope> allowedScopes)
Description copied from interface: TopicExpansionManager
Set the scope filter to apply on names of the topics appear in the result. Every name under a scope that is not allowed will be eliminated during the expansion.

To reset this filter, set it to null.

Specified by:
setScopeFilter in interface TopicExpansionManager
Parameters:
allowedScopes - collection of scopes those are allowed

setDirectionFilter

public void setDirectionFilter(RelationDirection direction)
Description copied from interface: TopicExpansionManager
Set the relation direction filter to apply during expansion. Relations will be expanded only in the specified direction.

To reset this filter, set it to null.

Specified by:
setDirectionFilter in interface TopicExpansionManager

expandList

public List<TopicResult> expandList(Collection<Topic> baseTopics)
Description copied from interface: TopicExpansionManager
Expand the specified base topics into a list of topic results ordered by the weight of the best path from the base topic. The result contains the base topic results and all the related topic results within the specified criteria.

Specified by:
expandList in interface TopicExpansionManager
Returns:
a list of expanded topic results, including the base topic results

expandTree

public List<TopicResultNode> expandTree(Collection<Topic> baseTopics)
Description copied from interface: TopicExpansionManager
Expand the specified base topics into a list of topics result nodes ordered by the weight of the best path from the base topic. The result contains the base topics result nodes and all the related topic result nodes within the specified criteria.

Specified by:
expandTree in interface TopicExpansionManager
Parameters:
baseTopics - the base topic to start the search from
Returns:
a list of expanded topic nodes, including the base topic nodes

getRelatedTopics

protected Collection<TopicResultNodeImpl> getRelatedTopics(TopicResultNodeImpl topicResult)
Get the topics those are in direct connection with the specified topics. The specified direction filter should be considered during relation expansion.

Parameters:
topic - the topic to get directly related topics for
Returns:
the collection of directly related topics

filterTopicNames

protected Collection<String> filterTopicNames(Topic topic)
Return the topic names of the specified topic filtered by the scopes filter set with TopicExpansionManager.setScopeFilter(Collection).

Parameters:
topic - the topic to filter the names of
